value.title: StarCraft 2: THREE STALKERS vs THREE RAVAGERS! (Viewer Game)
value.excerpt: A super close match of StarCraft 2 between a Zerg and a Protoss in Diamond League. In this game we see a Proxy Hatchery versus a Photon Cannon Rush get down the final units of three Protoss Stalkers and three Zerg Ravagers.
